title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 32.8 - Corporations not required or permitted to file a combined return
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 32.8 - Corporations not required or permitted to file a combined return

State Regulations
(a) A corporation
that is taxable under another franchise tax imposed by the Tax Law (or would be
taxable under another franchise tax if subject to tax). (b) insurance corporations subject to the tax
imposed by section 1502-a. (c) captive insurance corporations subject to the tax imposed by section
1502-b. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
32.8

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
